info.title: JustFix API
info.description: Api for accessing housing data maintained by JustFix.

wow_portfolio_units.description: Total number of residential units across properties in this WOW portfolio.

wow_portfolio_bbls.description: Total number of properties in this WOW portfolio.

latest_co.description: Most recent date of Certificate of Occupancy issued for the property

co_bin.description: The BIN (Building Identification Number) associated with the latest Certificate of Occupancy

post_hstpa_rs_units.description: Most recent non-zero number of registered rent stabilized units for 2019-2023.

is_nycha.description: Whether or not the property appears in list of NYCHA properties

is_subsidized.description: Whether or not the property appears in Furman Center's Subsidized Housing Database as having LIHTC, HUD project-based subsidy or financing, HPD programs, Mitchel-Lama, or NYCHA

subsidy_name.description: Name of the subsidy program the building has, from Furman Center's Subsidized Housing Database and Article XI data

get.summary: Returns data for determining the eligibility for Good Cause Eviction protections for the requested property (BBL).

parameters.name: bbl
parameters.description: BBL of the property, in 10-digit zero-padded format

200.description: Data for determining GCE eligibility. Returns empty list if the BBL does not appear in the current version of PLUTO.

400.description: Bad Request. BBL should be a 10-digit padded BBL.
